column1: In early stage of the legendarium
column3: p. 24 was a  name given by the Noldoli to Tuor dwelling place near Mithrim. The floor of the cove was white sand; the walls were embellished by Tuor with animals
column5: trees and flowers. His favourite carving was a swan
column6: which eventually became the emblem of his house. Tuor dwelt there for a while
column7: until Ulmo appointed him with the mission to reach Gondolin.
